gameDetails.name: Great Western Trail: The Eleventh Building Tile
gameDetails.description:
Included in Great Western Trail: Rails to the North expansion


Originally part of the Deutscher Spielepreis 2017 Goodie Box.Great Western Trail: The Eleventh Bulding Tile adds four new double sided building tiles (one for each colour).

Front side: Perform the action "Remove a hazard".

Back side: Move your engine up to as many spaces forward as you have hazard tiles in front of you.
